txt.en: 'You are a worthy servant of the Master. Go, and complete your mission.'
'The time has come to prove yourself worthy. Speak the words in the King's chosen language.'
The door is open!\n\nYou should retrieve the second stone!

'You are worthy! Take this. By your own hands the door may be unlocked. Reunite the stones. All will serve the Master!'\n\nHe reaches into the gaping maw that comprises most of his body, produces an ancient key, and hands it to you.
You should talk to the Emissary in the Mountains of Shadow Chamber.
The Emissary has asked you to speak the pass code in \qthe King's chosen language\q.\n\nYou should speak the words to the Emissary.
You have the key!\n\nYou should unlock the door and retrieve the second stone!
'I do not want to hear your excuses! You must stand before the King! Now!'
The time has come to speak the password to the Emissary.
